tbag.io

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • tbag.io.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creation of a custom window to be used instead of the native command line. Allows for colors and font scaling.
    Author:
    Trevor Skupien
    See Also:
    Vallentin's Java Tutorials
